name: @preact-wmr-twind-zero/wmr1
description: Preact WMR Twind 'zero runtime' monorepo - WMR demo 1
author: Daniel Weck (https://github.com/danielweck)

scripts.patch-preact-types: cpy "node_modules/preact/hooks/src/index.d.ts" "." --rename=".types/preact-hooks_.d.ts" && sed "1s/^/export as namespace preacthooks;\n/" ".types/preact-hooks_.d.ts" > ".types/preact-hooks__.d.ts" && sed "s/from '\.\.\/\.\.';/from '..\/node_modules\/preact\/src\/index.js';/" ".types/preact-hooks__.d.ts" > ".types/preact-hooks.d.ts" && rimraf ".types/preact-hooks_.d.ts" && rimraf ".types/preact-hooks__.d.ts"
scripts.build-no-prerender: pnpm clean && cross-env DEBUG=* wmr build
scripts.build_: pnpm clean && cross-env DEBUG=* wmr build --prerender && pnpm afterbuild
scripts.build-repeat-if-fail: (pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || pnpm build_ || exit 0) || echo OK
scripts.build-github_: pnpm clean && cross-env DEBUG=* BUILD_FOR_GITHUB=1 wmr build --prerender && pnpm afterbuild
scripts.build-github-repeat-if-fail: (pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || pnpm build-github_ || exit 0) || echo OK
scripts.build-viz: pnpm clean && cross-env DEBUG=* wmr build --prerender --visualize && pnpm afterbuild
